Updates the frustum plane equations according to the current camera setup / Camera.type(), Camera.position(), Camera.orientation(), Camera.zNear(), and Camera.zFar() values), by simply calling Camera.computeFrustumEquations().

zNear() - Method in class remixlab.proscene.Camera
Returns the near clipping plane distance used by the Camera projection matrix.
zNearCoefficient() - Method in class remixlab.proscene.Camera
Returns the coefficient which is used to set Camera.zNear() when the Camera is inside the sphere defined by Camera.sceneCenter() and Camera.zClippingCoefficient() * Camera.sceneRadius().
